title: Less 2.0.0-b2 loads in browser the same less files multiple times
body:
If you have maybe a less mixin file and import it in every depended less file, then will be less load the mixin file by every import statement

see console output:
XHR: Getting 'http://localhost/css-src/frontend/variables.less' less.js:725
XHR: Getting 'http://localhost/css-src/frontend/colors.less' less.js:725
XHR: Getting 'http://localhost/css-src/lib/font.less' less.js:725
**XHR: Getting 'http://localhost/css-src/lib/mixins.less' less.js:725**
XHR: Getting 'http://localhost/css-src/lib/font.less' less.js:725
**XHR: Getting 'http://localhost/css-src/lib/mixins.less' less.js:725**
XHR: Getting 'http://localhost/css-src/frontend/colors.less' less.js:725
**XHR: Getting 'http://localhost/css-src/lib/mixins.less' less.js:725**
rendered http://localhost/css-src/frontend/styles.less successfully.
